build.buildCommand: mkdir -p storage/framework/{views,cache,sessions} storage/logs bootstrap/cache && chmod -R 777 storage bootstrap/cache && install-php-extensions zip && composer install --optimize-autoloader --no-scripts --no-interaction --no-dev && npm ci --omit=dev && npm run build && php artisan package:discover --ansi && php artisan storage:link && php artisan filament:upgrade && php artisan livewire:publish --assets

deploy.startCommand: php artisan config:clear && php artisan cache:clear && php artisan view:clear && php artisan migrate --force && php artisan serve --host=0.0.0.0 --port=${PORT}
